page.title: 13EDUCATION SCHOOLS SCRAPTOFT
page.content: After assembly we go back to our room. Every morning we do maths.and English. On Monday afternoon, we do our topic. We are finding out about trees and flowers which grow in our area for our Domesday project. Then we have PE.On Tuesday we watch ZIG ZAG on the video and then we have a quiz. On Wednesday morning we have hymn practice before maths.In the afternoon we do our topic and we have games.You can do rounders,cricket,mixed games or country dancing.On Thursday,we listen to a radio programme called 'In the News'.Then we go swimming.On Friday we do topic again,but the children who are not so good,go to reading club. Next we have music and then our teacher reads us a story.Sometimes we have different things like Sports Day or a Sponsored Walk to raise money for school fund.
